:::The Destrocons/Sharpedge/Jetstorm/Godfather/Torca/Sideswipe:::

::Ramjet nodded::
Ramjet: Good. Follow us.
::The three of them transform to beast mode and head to their base, hoping 
that Apocalypse was following::
~~~~~
::Sharpedge reaches the Iron Fist, walks to his quarters, and collpses in his 
bed::
~~~~~
::Jetstorm and Sharpedge reach the CF and transform::
Jetstorm: Hello... Goodbye!
::he fires 25 energy blasts at Torca.  Torca was hit by some of them::
Torca: Let's see if you can handle this!
::He switched his dorsal gun to charge launcher and fired a charge at 
Jetstorm.  Jetstorm jumps aside.  They continued their fight.  Godfather 
meanwhile is in heavy combat with Sideswipe.  Slowly the reamisn of the Mafia 
get the upper hand, and the two Maximals are struggling to survive::

--part1_67.12f9e13b.281254e9_boundary
